availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin Reed (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and laborer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Malvina Nichols Reed in Bath County, Kentucky, in April 1849. Father of George Reed, Polly Reed, James Reed, Nelly Reed, and Thomas J. Reed. Farmer in Bath County in 1850. Laborer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 59A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 88.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Wyoming Precinct, p. 129B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 5625.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film 000273005.
